snippet.title: Retro Mystery Club Vol. 1: The Ise-Shima Case
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2265440/Retro_Mystery_Club_Vol1_The_IseShima_Case

This classic-style mystery adventure game, inspired by the Famicom Detective Club series and illustrated by Famitu's legend Kiyokazu Arai, will take you on a suspenseful journey through the beautiful landscapes of Ise-Shima.
